name: Super Squash! - Entry for LDJAM 42
description:
Super Squash! - Compo entry for LDJAM42

You play twins farmers, trying not to get squashed by their environment!

Gamepad is recommended, keyboard possible
Move around usind LEFT and RIGHT stick (WASD + arrow keys)
Push Boxes.

And most important: Don't get Squashed!

Can you make it?

Finished within about 19 hours of work.

Site includes HTML5, Windows EXE and Compo required Source Code!
